thread.title: Fun Day planned for girls to try hockey
thread.title_full: Fun Day planned for girls to try hockey

title: Fun Day planned for girls to try hockey
text:
Fun Day planned for girls to try hockey By: Uncredited Report Error 
Hockey Brandon is hosting its Esso Fun Day on Oct. 10. 
The program, which gives girls the opportunity to try hockey in a fun and safe environment, is reserved for newcomers to the sport. 
On-ice adult instructors will be assisted by female midget and Brandon Midget AAA Wheat Kings players. 
Equipment is required. 
For details or to register, call Hockey Brandon’s office at 204-726-3550.
